code: @Test public void testExpressionReturnsTheCorrectValue() {     // Given     GroovyShellFactory groovyShellFactory = mock(GroovyShellFactory.class).     given(groovyShellFactory.createGroovyShell(any(Exchange.class))).willReturn(new GroovyShell()).     SimpleRegistry registry = new SimpleRegistry().     registry.put("groovyShellFactory", groovyShellFactory).     CamelContext camelContext = new DefaultCamelContext(registry).     // When     assertExpression(GroovyLanguage.groovy("exchange.in.body"), new DefaultExchange(camelContext), null).     // Then     verify(groovyShellFactory).createGroovyShell(any(Exchange.class)). }
